name: fixlify-skills
description: Production-ready skills and commands for Fixlify repair shop management system. Includes QA, deployment, security, database migrations, and more.
author: Fixlify Team

skills.name: frontend-design
skills.description: Create distinctive, production-grade UI for Fixlify with shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS, and React patterns

skills.name: qa-expert
skills.description: Comprehensive QA and testing skill with TDD support, unit/E2E tests, and coverage analysis

skills.name: deploy-ops
skills.description: Deployment automation for Vercel and Supabase with rollback support

skills.name: db-migration
skills.description: Database migration management with RLS policies and type generation

skills.name: security-audit
skills.description: OWASP-based security audit with RLS verification and vulnerability scanning

skills.name: feature-builder
skills.description: Feature scaffolding with component templates, hooks, and database setup

skills.name: hotfix-handler
skills.description: Emergency incident response and hotfix deployment workflow

install.instructions: Copy .claude/skills and .claude/commands directories to your project
